title: Person of Interest - We all save life (05x11)
author: POI - Best Of
comment: In the finale, we see that the machine's clone is coming online - a way to give the fans the idea that the machine is still out there helping folks even though the show is off the air - and this episode teased the idea that the machine had other teams working in other cities all along :) And the fact that these three were recruited by the machine after they had been rescued by John's team in the first place, was a nice touch.
As perfect as the twist was I wish I could have seen their faces when John came up as their number.

Not trying to be a bust, but can you imagine how much more awesome it would've been if they had a full blown 23, episode final season instead of 13? Cus they didn't explore some of the open plot points. Like Claire, like what did Samaritan want with the President (the kid wanted a meet with Prez after the stock market crash), more of Elias and more of John becoming more open about his feelings.
THEY NEED TO MAKE A PERSON OF INTEREST SPIN OFF WITH THOSE THREE
always wished that Leon was part of their crew too!
description:
- Extract from season 5 episode 11
